item.title: Globe and Mail Feature on the Hart House Chess Club
item.description: The following page was written by Cecil Rosner, one of the only chess columnists currently still writing articles as of 2023. Rosner’s pieces are published weekly on The Globe and Mail here. I was featured by Rosner in a piece titled “Canadaâ€™s biggest college chess club still going strong after 127 years “ on Janruary 8, 2023. I did the interview with Bowen Zhang, at that time the Fundraising Director for the Hart House Chess Club.
